      Component key: <b>prismatic</b>
    </small>
  </div>
</div>

## Description

This component allows you to communicate with Composer's GraphQL API.
You can interact with your integrations, instances, flows, and more.

API Documentation:
[Intro to Composer's GraphQL API](https://elasticpath.dev/composer/builder/api/api-overview/)

## Connections

### Composer Refresh Token

To start using the Composer component you need to use your authenticated prism client to call the `prism me:token --type refresh` command.
Running this command will give you a refresh token, which you can use to make requests to the Composer API.

Now that you have your token, create a new Composer connection and enter the token you received from the Prism CLI.

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      placeholder: "Refresh Token",
      comments:
        "Provide the Refresh Token obtained from the prism command line by calling prism me:token --type refresh.",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      key: "apiKey",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Refresh Token",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "status": 200,
    "data": {
      "instances": {
        "pageInfo": {
          "hasNextPage": false,
          "hasPreviousPage": false,
          "startCursor": "example",
          "endCursor": "example"
        },
        "nodes": [
          {
            "id": "example",
            "updatedAt": "2022-02-28T21:04:42.282103+00:00",
            "labels": [
              "Example Labels"
            ],
            "name": "Test Instance",
            "customer": {
              "id": "example"
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}
```

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "status": 200,
    "data": {
      "integrations": {
        "nodes": [
          {
            "id": "example3843985702395",
            "labels": [
              "Example Labels"
            ],
            "avatarUrl": "",
            "name": "example",
            "createdAt": "2022-02-28T20:52:49.763944+00:00",
            "category": null,
            "allowRemove": true,
            "actions": {
              "nodes": [
                {
                  "id": "r80837409928349uf2309f3"
                }
              ]
            },
            "flows": {
              "edges": [
                {
                  "node": {
                    "id": "28y9483f893dwe"
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Raw GraphQL Request

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      comments: "Provide a query or mutation for the GraphQL request",
      required: true,
      language: "graphql",
      key: "query",
      type: "code",
      default:
        "query ($myCustomerId: ID!) {\n  customer(id: $myCustomerId) {\n    id\n    name\n    externalId\n  }\n}",
      label: "Query or Mutation",
    },
    {
      comments: "These should match the variables of your query or mutation.",
      required: false,
      key: "variables",
      type: "string",
      default: "",

<div id="updateinstance" />

### Update Instance

Update an existing instance | <small><b>key: updateInstance</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide a string value for the description of the instance",
      key: "description",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Description",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "Shopify Instance",
      comments: "Provide the unique ID of an instance.",
      key: "instanceId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Instance Id",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide a string value for the name of the instance",
      key: "name",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Name",
    },
  ]}
/>

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="updateintegration" />

### Update Integration

Update the information and metadata of an integration | <small><b>key: updateIntegration</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide a string value for the description.",
      key: "description",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Description",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Provide the unique identifier of an integration. This value should be the Id of the integration.",

      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Integration Id",
    },
    {
      required: true,

      key: "name",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Name",
    },
